node.title: Preselection headaches for Victorian Liberals as shadow treasurer moves on seat of drink-driving MP Tim Smith
node.alt: Matthew Guy addresses the media alongside Georgie Crozier and David Davis.
node.description: The Victorian Liberal party faces weeks of internal distraction with five sitting MPs being challenged for preselection and Shadow Treasurer David Davis making a bold bid to move to the lower house.
node.content:
["The Victorian Liberal party faces weeks of internal distraction with five sitting MPs being challenged for preselection and Shadow Treasurer David Davis making a bold bid to move to the lower house.", "Nominations for Liberal-held lower house seats, as well as a handful of other winnable seats, for next November's state election closed at lunch Friday.", "Tim Smith's drink-driving crash and forced decision to not recontest the seat of Kew\u00a0opened the door in the once-safe seat.", "Business Council of Australia policy director Jess Wilson, 31, had been considered a frontrunner and had strong support from state and federal MPs.\u00a0", "Now, Mr Davis has also thrown his hat in the ring on the back of local support.", "Mr Davis, who was first elected in 1996 and sat in the Parliament with Ms Wilson's father Ron, lives in Kew.", "Until this week, he repeatedly told reporters he was very happy in his role as Opposition Leader in the Upper House.", "The move has been described as \"insane\" by some Liberals, who see it as a vote of no confidence in Matthew Guy\u2019s leadership.", "Some believe Mr Davis has an eye on the leadership, should Mr Guy fail to defeat Daniel Andrews.", "Others are angry because the party has a poor track record of getting women into winnable seats.", "", "
Mr Davis previously told reporters he was happy in his Upper House role.(ABC News)
", "Mr Guy \u2013 who moved from the upper to the lower house seat of Bulleen in 2014 \u2013 said the Liberal Party was a democracy that gave all members the chance to run for office.", "\"He's the shadow treasurer. He's lived in that area for a very long time, I'll let the branch members make the decision,\" Mr Guy said.", "In one of the Liberal's safest seats of Malvern, former leader Michael O'Brien is being challenged by two people, including local councillor Alexander Lew.", "Mr Lew is an ally of party figure Michael Kroger.", "Outspoken Brighton MP James Newbury is also in the sights of preselectors in Brighton with two women, including previous challenger Felicity Frederico, trying to unseat him.", "In Melbourne's east, unvaccinated MP Neil Angus faces a test from a close friend of Mr Guy, Nick McGowan.", "Mr Angus currently represents Forest Hill, but that seat has been abolished and replaced with the new Glen Waverley\u00a0electorate that takes in nearly 70 per cent of his old seat.", "Mr Angus is banned from parliament for refusing to be vaccinated.", "He may not be able to attend any preselection convention.\u00a0", "Mr McGowan, who was Mr Guy's best man, was the Liberals'\u00a0candidate in Eltham in 2018.", "Elsewhere, former federal MP Chris Crewther is challenging David Morris in Mornington, while Brad Battin faces a test in the new seat of Berwick.", "Veterans Neale Burgess, MP for Hastings,\u00a0and Gary Blackwood, MP for Narracan,\u00a0are both retiring at the election.", "It is expected the preselections for the seats will be finalised by the end of the year."]
